sentences.english: Marxism faith is magistral faith of China.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義信仰是中國社會的主導信仰。

sentences.english: Inculcation is the basic way of Marxist theory education.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸是馬克思主義政治教育的基本原則。

sentences.english: Mark couldn't pay his bill, so he asked the owner to put it on the cuff.
sentences.chinese: 馬克付不起帳了，就向店主賒賬。

sentences.english: Carmack said Id turned down many offers from large publishers over the years.
sentences.chinese: 卡馬克說號拒絕了許多優惠大出版商多年來。

sentences.english: Listen to the interview with Mr. Malcolm Lang Land and answer the following questions.
sentences.chinese: 聽下面的對馬克姆朗蘭德的彩旗，回答下列問題。

sentences.english: Second, the paper scrutinizes the Confucianists ideas in the way of the Marxism outlook .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是用馬克思主義觀點審視儒家德治思想。

sentences.english: Marx, with his usual perversity, thought it was both.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思，帶着慣常的倔強，認爲它兩者都是。

sentences.english: Marxism believes in the primacy of matter.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義相信物質是第一性的。

sentences.english: First, it inquires into Marx's conception of social development.
sentences.chinese: 首先探討了馬克思的社會發展論。

sentences.english: The Reception Study of Georg Lukács s Literature and Art Theory in China;
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義文藝理論是中國文藝理論的支柱和來源。

sentences.english: Mark twisted the gun from Don's hand with ungentle force.
sentences.chinese: 馬克用不溫和的力量擰來自君的手槍。
他們明目張膽地篡改馬克思主義。

sentences.english: Which indeed is approved by Marxism- Leninism?
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義到底贊成哪一個呢？

sentences.english: Mark Malloch-Brown has been involved in international affairs for more than three decades.
sentences.chinese: 馬克馬洛赫褐色一直參與國際事務超過三十年。

sentences.english: Tegmark is an expert in analyzing the cosmic microwave background and galaxy clustering.
sentences.chinese: 鐵馬克是分析宇宙微波背景輻射與星系團的專家。

sentences.english: According to Marxist theory, the Concept of Life and Death is exactly the World Outlook.
sentences.chinese: 按照馬克思主義的說法，生死觀就是世界觀。
